name: SPE Toolbox
short_description: This toolbox is a collection of MatLab functions for reading WinView/WinSpec files (.spe extension) directly to MatLab. It provides functions for reading full header from file into a structure, reading frames into matrices, and reading pixel values across all frames. You can use these functions to analyse and process experiment data stored in .spe files in MatLab, and to write functions to export .spe files to animated GIFs for use in presentations. Also includes simple MatLab application for converting files to GIF, AVI and .spe files, and provides functionality for quick addition of support for WinView-like formats by users, without the need to call developers.
summary: MatLab functions for reading WinView/WinSpec .spe files
